SSG_Tools
Interface IGL_Renderable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BezierCurve, BezierSurface, Box, Circle, CullBackFacesOnOff, DetectorGroup, DetectorScene, DetectorSceneBase, DetectorSceneFrames, DirectionalLight, Group, Light, LightingOnOff, Line, LineStrip, Material, MatrixTransform, Node, NormalizeOnOff, OrientationTransform, Parallelogram, PixelBox, PixelParallelogram, PixelPolymarker, PixelPositionedBox, PlanarSurface, PointLight, Polymarker, PositionedBox, Rotate, Scale, Shape, SimpleShape, SolidBox, Sphere, SpotLight, StrokeText, TransformGroup, Translate
public interface IGL_Renderable

This interface is the interface that classes must implement in order to be "rendered" by the JoglDriverProgram object. The action taken to render the object may be different for different types of objects, such as Shapes, Lights, Transforms and Groups.

Method Summary
 void Render(net.java.games.jogl.GLDrawable drawable)
          Render this object using the specified drawable.
 

Method Detail

Render this object using the specified drawable.

Parameters:
drawable - The drawable on which the object is to be rendered.
